title: Can my friend write me a recommendation letter? - Quora

response.answer_text: QA2A. No, because peer reviews are not telling the admission committee what you bring to the table. It is not an evaluation by a manager who can say what your qualities are in management. What your friends can say is that you are doing on staff work. When you apply to an MBA program, you will be competing with season managers, and doing a startup with three friends will not be competitive with an applicant that has five to eight years of work experience, which is the average number of years of admitted MBA students.
